text:
On our VM-Ware on slx-cluster (OS Suse Linux ES 10 SP 2) JMeter-HTTP-checks needs serveral minutes (up to 500 seconds) to establish the initial https connection. Every further HTTPS-requests run within a few seconds up to one minute. This behavior occurs in all our JMeter-skripts on this machine.
In our test environment (HP DL 385, OS Suse Linux ES 10 SP 2) all this JMeter-scripts run in a normal manner (< 1 minute per script with a few https-requests).
Our java-version on both environments is 1.4.2_x
Kind regards 
Ralph
creator: ralph.munderloh@lhsystems.com

text: This is not a JMeter bug; there's clearly some problem with the VMWare setup.
creator: sebb@apache.org
